description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes in a tic-tac-toe interactive web application, defining variables for light and dark themes, as well as styles for various components such as the app container, header, links, and a theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Root application container with styles applying a center-aligned layout and background color based on the selected theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header component styled for flexibility with alignment and themes.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling associated with the application, including hover effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between themes, with styles for default and hover states.
